page.title: 13Farming, Contd.. Health
page.content: It is a mixed farm producing maize and grass for silage for dairy and beef cattle. Also sugar beet seed and milling wheat, malting barley and field beans. Russell's Farm , Falkenham(Tennated) is a mixed farm producing barley, wheat, sugar beat, beans. Beef cattle are reared. HEALTH : An Infant Welfare Clinic( Mothers and Babies) is held on the 2nd wed at 2pm. at Kirton Church Hall. There is a hospital car lift scheme. A 'Meals on Wheels' scheme operates taking cooked meals to the elderly, disabled and house bound residents. Mians water supply is available to all. There is a mains drainage system in Kirton where there are sewage works, but most of Falkenham have cess pools which are emptied on request.
